original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Opammakathāpañha
analyzed: opamma kathā pañha

original: Pathavīvagga
analyzed: pathavīvagga

original: 8. Sūriyaṅgapañha
analyzed: sūriyaṅgapañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘sūriyassa satta aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni satta aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena sūriyassa satta aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni satta aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, sūriyo sabbaṁ udakaṁ parisoseti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja sūriyaḥ sabbam udakam parisoseti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbakilesā anavasesaṁ parisosetabbā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena sabba kilesā anavasesam parisosetabbā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, sūriyassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja sūriyassa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, sūriyo tamandhakāraṁ vidhamati;
analyzed: punar capara mahā rāja sūriyaḥ tam andhakāram vidhamati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbaṁ rāgatamaṁ dosatamaṁ mohatamaṁ mānatamaṁ diṭṭhitamaṁ kilesatamaṁ sabbaṁ duccaritatamaṁ vidhamayitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena sabbam rāgatamam dosatamam mohatamam mānatamam diṭṭhitamam kilesatamam sabbam duccaritatamam

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, sūriyassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja sūriyassa dutiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, sūriyo abhikkhaṇaṁ carati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja sūriyaḥ abhikkhaṇam carati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena abhikkhaṇaṁ yoniso manasikāro kātabbo.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena abhikkhaṇam yonisas manasikāraḥ kātabbo

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, sūriyassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja sūriyassa tatiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, sūriyo raṁsimālī;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja sūriyaḥ rasimālī

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ārammaṇamālinā bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena ārammaṇa mālinā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, sūriyassa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja sūriyassa catuttham aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, sūriyo mahājanakāyaṁ santāpento carati;
analyzed: punar capara mahā rāja sūriyaḥ mahā jana kāyam carati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ācārasīlaguṇavattappaṭipattiyā jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattiindriyabalabojjhaṅgasatipaṭṭhānasammappadhānaiddhipādehi
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena ācāra sīla guṇavat tad paṭipattiyā jhāna vimokkha samādhi samāpatti indriya bala bojjhaṅga sati paṭṭhāna sammappadhāna aiddhipādehi

original: sadevako loko santāpayitabbo.
analyzed: sa devakaḥ lokaḥ santāpayitabbo

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, sūriyassa pañcamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja sūriyassa pañcamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, sūriyo rāhubhayā bhīto carati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja sūriyaḥ rāhu bhayā carati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena duccaritaduggativisamakantāravipākavinipātakilesajālajaṭite
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena duccarita duggati visama kantāra vipāka vinipāta kilesa jāla jaṭite

original: diṭṭhisaṅghāṭapaṭimukke kupathapakkhande kummaggapaṭipanne satte disvā mahatā saṁvegabhayena
analyzed: diṭṭhi saṅghāṭa paṭimukke kupatha pakkhande kummagga paṭipanne satte disvā mahatā sa vega bhayena

original: mānasaṁ saṁvejetabbaṁ.
analyzed: mānasam

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, sūriyassa chaṭṭhaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja sūriyassa chaṭṭham aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, sūriyo kalyāṇapāpake dasseti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja sūriyaḥ kalyāṇa pāpake dasseti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena indriyabalabojjhaṅgasatipaṭṭhānasammappadhānaiddhipādalokiyalokuttaradhammā dassetabbā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena indriya bala bojjhaṅga sati paṭṭhāna sammappadhāna eddhipāda lokiya lokuttara dhammāḥ dassetabbā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, sūriyassa sattamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja sūriyassa sattamam aṅgam

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, therena vaṅgīsena—
analyzed: mahā rāja therena vaṅgīsena

original: ‘Yathāpi sūriyo udayanto,
analyzed: yathā api sūriyaḥ udayantaḥ

original: Rūpaṁ dasseti pāṇinaṁ;
analyzed: rūpam dasseti

original: Suciñca asuciñcāpi,
analyzed: suciñca a suciñca api

original: Kalyāṇañcāpi pāpakaṁ.
analyzed: kalyāṇam ca api pāpaka

original: Tathā bhikkhu dhammadharo,
analyzed: tathā bhikkhu dhamma dharo

original: avijjāpihitaṁ janaṁ;
analyzed: avidja apihitam jana

original: Pathaṁ dasseti vividhaṁ,
analyzed: patham

original: ādiccovudayaṁ yathā’”ti.
analyzed: yathā ati

original: Sūriyaṅgapañho aṭṭhamo.
analyzed: sūriyaṅga pañhaḥ aṭṭhamo
